entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NRE from spell checker while working in Roslyn #69919
  • Support go to definition (F12) for `goto` statements, navigating to the target label #69916
  • CS1673 false positive #69907
  • CSharpGeneratorDriver - possible glitch re "features" (causes "Inconsistent syntax tree features" failure) #69906
  • Perf: Lazily populate FileIdentifier fields #69905
  • Freeze when switching to some C# file tabs while Document Outline feature is enabled #69903
  • Document Outline clicking isn't working with collapsed regions #69902
  • Overload resolution API #69898
  • Build fails when source generator have dependencies #69897
  • EnC: support member reordering edits #69894

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34112.182 #69923
  • Perf: Unrevert "Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references" #69908
  • OperationVisitor cannot handle NoneOperation #69837
  • Refactoring to new .cs doesn't open new file in Mac [macOS] #69589
    September
  • Synthesize type for collection expressions targeting IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, or IReadOnlyList<T> #69623
    17.8
  • Collection expressions: generic method type inference not working when spreading IEnumerable<T> #69706
    17.8
  • Reduce LOH allocations for SemanticToken classification in LSP #69914
  • Reduce overhead due to lsp semantic token refresh requests #69913
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser #69912
  • Switch PatternMatcher to use a TemporaryArray instead of ArrayBuilder. #69911
  • Lazily build a case-insensitive comparison for performance #69904
  • AnalyzeDataFlow reports captured primary ctor parameters in lambdas that do not capture any #69152
    Compiler.Next
  • MissingMethodException for init setters #69678
    Compiler.Next
  • NullableWalker should ignore locals of primitive value types such as 'int' #50473
    C# 12.0
  • Source generator doesn't see ProjectReference in ReferencedAssemblySymbols in Roslyn time generation #57997
    C# 12.0
  • Add AnalyzerConfigSet.GetOptionsForDirectory #61217
    C# 12.0
  • Allow ref field of the containing type #62098
    C# 12.0
  • Test plan for "Default Lambda Parameters" #62485
    C# 12.0
  • NRE in `dotnet-runtime-perf` with wasm+AOT #64312
    C# 12.0
  • Make `Path.GetTempPath()` a banned API in the compiler codebase #64949
    17.8
  • Events in records are included in generated Equals #65170
    C# 12.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure Endfilter basic block is preserved even if technically unreachable. #69922
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Document outline updates #69921
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update LanguageServerHost to use NamedPipeServerStream #69918
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do source-generation only in our OOP process. #69917
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial implementation of sub-heading spans (for sticky scroll) #69915
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add OrchardCore test to OptProf config #69909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SBRP dependency #69901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Resolve source-built prebuilts #69900
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dev/toddgrun/revert 769dfa13624dae1bbba1afbdfaeb85f928843004 and use multi dictionary pool #69896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix escaping and wrapping in vscode hover #69893
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Sign content of .tgz files #69814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid treating methods as SymbolCategory.Other #69540
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add SkipApplyOptimizationData option to pr-validation CI pipeline #69910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Collection expressions: type inference from spread elements #69856
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Remove unnecessary runtime identifiers in build host project #69895
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Minor tweaks to SG generation in the compilation tracker. #69889
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle long extension invocation chains #69831
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Localize 17.8 #69890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • EnC: Generate correct state mapping for methods containing await foreach #69806
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Nullable conversion of collection expressions #69852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Lazily populate FileIdentifier fields #69882
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69788
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Ensure local function invocations and method references always have null receivers #56395
    Area-Compilers, Backlog
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community, Backlog
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Backlog
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, Backlog
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE, Backlog
  • Add ExternalAccess API for interceptors #68652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Backlog
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Replace InterceptorsPreview with InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces=global #69848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Refactoring of synthesized types tracking across EnC generations #69782
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid static overhead for switch-over-string optimization #69673
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly refere… #69891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Colorize unbound `partial` identifier as a keyword #69877
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix issue with stale cached data in LSP pull diagnostics #69864
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow Razor to format a new document it wants to create #69878
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
